content:
It seems that you are encountering a Unicode escape error, which occurs when Python tries to interpret special characters in a string, such as backslashes. To avoid this error, you can either use a raw string or escape the backslashes with another backslash.

Here's an example using a raw string:
```python
GOOGLE_CLOUD_SPEECH_CREDENTIALS = r'C:\Users\Dan.QTIS\Desktop\Dan-Special\Tests\caramel-base-379922-9d9af53bf1a0.json'
```
Alternatively, you can escape the backslashes with another backslash like this:
```python
GOOGLE_CLOUD_SPEECH_CREDENTIALS = 'C:\\Users\\Dan.QTIS\\Desktop\\Dan-Special\\Tests\\caramel-base-379922-9d9af53bf1a0.json'
```
